# GetControlValue

**Instance Method**

Gets the floating-point stereo pan value of the control.

## Declaration

```swift
float GetControlValue();
```

## Return Value

The floating-point stereo pan value of the control.

## Discussion

This method synchronizes by using the work queue created by the object.

## Accessing the Value

- **SetControlValue**: Sets the stereo pan value of the control.
- **SetPanningChannels**: Sets the current stereo panning channels.
- **GetPanningChannels**: Gets the current stereo panning channels.
